org.corfudb.runtime.view

Class StreamingSequencer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.runtime.view.StreamingSequencer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISequencer, IStreamingSequencer

    public class StreamingSequencer
extends Object
implements IStreamingSequencer
    This view implements a streaming sequencer. It tries to use a streaming sequencer, if available, but falls back to a non-stream aware sequencer if it is not.
    Author:
    Michael Wei

      • getNext

        public long getNext(UUID streamID,
                    int numTokens)
        Description copied from interface: IStreamingSequencer
        This function returns tokens.
        Specified by:
        getNext in interface IStreamingSequencer
        Parameters:
        streamID - The stream ID to return tokens for.
        numTokens - The number of tokens to issue. 0 means no tokens.
        Returns:
        The next token in the sequence.
